post.body: wish I could watch from my iPhone, traveling today. Will be following tweets.
congrats on inaug trip. Can't wait to read your coverage.
have a great vacation. When you get back, you'll have to come over and meet my kitty.
congrats on finishing up the semester. Have a great break.
yeah, with zoom. I'll post pix from my actual camera when I get back.
good luck with your finals. It'll all be over soon!
have a good trip and enjoy the workshop. Very interested in what you will be doing.
congrats on new camera! Let me know if you have any tips for low light. Met @jimware during my nc visit. He's on way to yr workshop.
Hi Eliz. Just saw your reply. Actually the pix you see are from my iPhone. Took lots with the new camera though, will post later.
luckily I'm in nc, 70 degrees here today. Heading back to atx tomorrow night
love the blog. Good stuff. Keep it up. And Merry Christmas!
so sorry to hear about your trip. Will you be able to make it to Austin after Christmas?
I feel your pain. Hope you make it out soon. Let me know if you have time to get together while you are in Austin.
have fun on all your Christmas travels!
that's a great idea
rdu terminal 2 much nicer than old terminal. Has seats w power access. Food is marginal, though. Just as well. Prob gained 10 lbs this wk
RT: @JulesHanna: Good social construct: Anita Campbell on "Other-Centered" vs. Self-Centered tweeting http://tinyurl.com/6jcx64
RT @jayrosen_nyu: Newspaper in Oakland Country, MI decides to holds classes for citizen journalists http://is.gd/bTsj
http://twitpic.com/tcmd finally made it to the beach on last day here. Very peaceful in the winter.
Finally done looking at Grad Student projects. Will complete grading them when I return to Austin. Starting on undergrads now.
Stay warm Austinites. Can't believe I'm missing the big chill. Looks like it'll be back to normal temps by the time I return tonight.
Tired of seeing the E at the top of my iPhone. Ready to get back to a 3G-friendly area.
http://twitpic.com/t5n9 biking down by Snow's Cut Park in Carolina Beach
heading out to take my mom's new bike on a test run.
It's fun to meet Twitter friends irl. Just had lunch with Wilmington Star-News twitterers @shanbow @jimware & @royalja. Good conversation!
Merry Christmas Twitter friends!
Driving with convertible top down, listening to Old 97's. Now that's the way to spend Christmas Eve. Gotta love Christmas temps in the 70s.
RT: @ryansholin Are you a nerd? The Las Vegas Sun is hiring. Again. Go work for @robcurley: http://bit.ly/4aBL Interesting job description.
Some pix from Trail of Lights at http://onthatnote.com.
Made post about assisting "defeatist" students in lab. http://tinyurl.com/7pltzs. Comments? Ideas? No more work for me now, just holiday fun
Making these Lobster-Tarragon Toasts for Christmas Eve dinner tonight http://snipurl.com/92qn8
We're at the tree. http://twitpic.com/vsev
Trail of Lights and a hot toddy. Happy Holidays!
Parking lot at N Central Mkt is a madhouse. I parked across street behind taco shack.
Gym music just got lots better. Video for Breeders' Cannonball. Anyone remember the sketch on The State "Try Wearing Pants"? Anyone? Anyone?
Ashamed that I turned off pandora to listen to high school musical video at gym. Guess i'm in it to win it.
RT: @yurivictor Best and worst logo redesigns of 2008: http://tinyurl.com/842459
Off to Chuy's for dinner and catching up with @yoadrianne
Regarding Jim Brady departure from Wash Post. Boo hoo. I really liked him, will miss him in that position.
RT: @jayrosen_nyu News: Jim Brady is departing as top editor of washingtonpost.com http://is.gd/d0bl
